SCTX:
Begin druleneScript

;Checks for the player to sell "Corky."
;Corky must be nearby (1000 units) and must be following the player.
;Might need some revision...

short corkyFollow
;same name as llovyn andus' thing... is 1 when Corky meets sale conditions

float counter
;keeps the distance check overhead at a minimum

if ( corkyFollow == 2 )
	Return
	;set in dialogue when you "sell" Corky... script does not run again
endif

if ( counter < 3 )
	Set counter to ( counter + GetSecondsPassed )
endif

Set counter to 0

if ( "guar_llovyn_unique"->GetCurrentAiPackage == 3 )
	if ( GetDistance "guar_llovyn_unique" < 1000 )
		Set corkyFollow to 1
	endif
endif

End
